A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was seriously underwhelmed and confused. The pointless subplots made me feel stupid for even caring. The hyperspeed ship thing seemed like a massive cop-out. And Mary Poppins Leia\, why didn't they just let her die? Animal milking? Why do good guys in Star Wars only exist to \"resist\" or \"rebel\" from bad guys? Their existence and countless deaths seem completely pointless. And now there are only like 20 of them left?
